record.jsxtip: Fires before the dialog is moved by the user dragging its caption bar with the mouse.

record.jsxtext: JSX Object about to be moved
set to true if only vertical allowed. For example: o = {bCONSTRAINX:true};
set to true if only horizontal allowed. For example: o = {bCONSTRAINY:true};

record.jsxtip: Fires after the dialog is moved by the user dragging its caption bar with the mouse.

record.jsxtext: The dialog that was just moved.

record.jsxtip: Fires before the dialog is resized by the user dragging its lower-right corner with the mouse.

record.jsxtext: JSX Object about to be resized

record.jsxtip: Fires after the dialog is resized by the user dragging its lower-right corner with the mouse.

record.jsxtext: JSX Object that was just resized

record.jsxtip: Fires when the item has just been removed from the DOM.

record.jsxtext: JSX Object that is in the process of being destroyed
the parent of this JSX Object before it was removed from the DOM tree
